name: NSColorWell
desc: A control that displays a color value and lets the user change that color value.

items.name: var color: NSColor
items.desc: The color of the color well.

items.name: func takeColorFrom(Any?)
items.desc: Changes the color of the color well to that of the specified object.

items.name: func activate(Bool)
items.desc: Activates the color well, displays the color panel, and makes the current color the same as its own.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the color well is active.

items.name: func deactivate()
items.desc: Deactivates the color well and redraws it.

items.name: var isBordered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the color well has a border.

items.name: func drawWell(inside: NSRect)
items.desc: Draws the area inside the color well at the specified location without drawing borders.
